scripts.init: node scripts/marge-json.mjs dev && kintone-plugin-packer --out dist/plugin-dev.zip plugin && node scripts/rename-ppk.mjs
scripts.build: node scripts/marge-json.mjs prod && kbuild prod plugin --prod-root cdn && kintone-plugin-packer --out dist/plugin.zip --ppk dist/private.ppk plugin
scripts.standalone: node scripts/marge-json.mjs standalone && kbuild prod plugin --prod-root plugin && kintone-plugin-packer --out dist/plugin-standalone.zip --ppk dist/private.ppk plugin
scripts.dev: node scripts/marge-json.mjs dev && kintone-plugin-packer --out dist/plugin-dev.zip --ppk dist/private.ppk plugin && concurrently "yarn:dev:*"
